name: Sage
otherNightReminder: If the Demon killed the Sage, wake the Sage and point to 2 players, 1 of which is the Demon.
ability: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.
flavor: "These mountainous tomes guard the secret, I am sure of it! Twixt word and word, it lies in wait. More candles, boy! More ink! These notes may look arcane, but the infernal puzzle is revealing itself."

jinxes.reason: The Recluse might register as the Demon to the Sage.
Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Sage uses their ability but does not die.
Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Sage uses their ability but does not die.
